verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* \nd Lord\nd* answer you \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* distress, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* name \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* Jacob’s God protect you,
sending \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w help|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* temple, out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion supporting \w you|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w All|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* meal-offerings may \w he|strong="H7971"\w* remember, \w your|strong="H7971"\w* burnt-offerings look \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H6726"\w* favour. \qs Selah\qs*

\w May|strong="H2142"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* grant \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* heart’s desire, \w and|strong="H5930"\w* \w bring|strong="H2142"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* plans \w to|strong="H4503"\w* pass.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* shout \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* joy \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* victory, \w and|strong="H6098"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*. \w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* request.

Now \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* sure \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* anointed. \w From|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* temple \w in|strong="H3068"\w* heaven \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* answer \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mighty triumphant \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

Some \w in|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w strong|strong="H1369"\w*, some \w in|strong="H3068"\w* horses; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* totter \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fall, while \w we|strong="H3068"\w* rise \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stand firm.

\w Give|strong="H5307"\w* victory, \nd Lord\nd*, \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* king, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* answer us \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H5749"\w*.
